attributes.action: permit Direct Payment or individual budget users to have Legal Aid to defend themselves as employers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, disabled people can employ their own assistants or support workers using the Direct Payments scheme and, where in use, the Individual Budget scheme. Despite the fact that they may be on income support they are automatically debarred from Legal Aid as employers. This is not justice.
